summary: This is a brief email from a Federal Protective Service Special Agent inquiring about obtaining Thomas' work schedule, likely in connection with the Epstein death investigation. It suggests coordination between agencies regarding personnel records.

persons.name: Thomas
persons.context: An individual whose work schedule is being requested, likely in connection with the Epstein death investigation.

connections.description: PP is seeking Thomas' work schedule as part of an investigation, likely related to Epstein's death.

events.title: Email inquiry about work schedule
events.description: A Federal Protective Service Special Agent emails to ask if they have or need to obtain Thomas' work schedule, referencing the Epstein death investigation.

keyFacts: An email dated September 6, 2019, shows a Federal Protective Service agent seeking 'Thomas' work schedule.
The email explicitly references the 'Epstein death invest[igation]', linking the request to that case.
The communication suggests inter-agency or internal coordination regarding personnel records post-Epstein's death.
